About Me

What you need to know about me

Bio

I am a self-taught developer/programmer. As a 37-year-old father of three and happily married for 16 years, and working paycheck to paycheck for most of my adult life, I decided to begin my career in the field that has always spoken to me: code. I've been tinkering with software and digging deep into computers and the operating systems that guide them since my dad brought home an IBM 386 when I was a kid. I've always felt more comfortable at a computer keyboard than anywhere else, and now I'm funneling that passion and knowledge into a calling.
